name: Krabs: The Money Manager
description: An app for money management which helps users make smarter financial decisions by enabling them keep track of their daily expenses. Built with React Native, Firebase, Chart, Git, e.t.c.

name: Report: Crime Alert
description: An app which solves a problem of security(awareness) by enabling users to send crime reports to a central authority along with their exact location, a video recording, and more. Built with React Native, Firebase, Geolocation, Map, Push Notification, Git, e.t.c.

name: Report-Admin
description: An app which receives the security reports from the “Report” app described previously. Built with React Native, Firebase, Geolocation, Map, Push Notification, Git, e.t.c.
